newsitem.title: SWEDEN: ATHLETICS-KIPKETER EQUALS 800 METRES WORLD RECORD.
newsitem.headline: ATHLETICS-KIPKETER EQUALS 800 METRES WORLD RECORD.

text.p: Dane Wilson Kipketer equalled the men's 800 metres world record on Monday when he clocked one minute 41.73 seconds at the Stockholm Grand Prix.
Briton Seb Coe was first to set the time in Firenze, Italy on June 10, 1981.
